short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the name of Donald j. Trump with 'Orange Man' on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a little fun thing i made to make all the news you are being bombarded with with a certain person named in it, a little bit more funny and enjoyable to read/stumble upon. :)

Features:
Changed all instances of Donald Trumps name to "Orange Man".
A language selector for different languages to change "Orange Man" to that language.
A glorious on and off button in the form of the Person's face.

For any mis pronunciations of "Orange Man" (the fruit orange) OR wanting to add more languages, please contact me in either reviews or the contact email about those changes!
